EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Honeywell AERO Tech Forum.2020 Honeywell Aero Tech Forum Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now & Plan to Join Us: Honeywell Tech Forum 2020 – Our New Norm and Future
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.honeywell.com/en-us/tech-forum?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=hon-corp_techforum2020&utm_content=aero]]>
Join us in October for the inaugural Honeywell Tech Forum 2020, a virtual event series centered on the innovation and technology driving today and tomorrow in our industry’s new norm. Check out the Agenda Sneak Peak for key dates and sessions.
The series includes expert panels, leadership conversations and business deep dives; including our partner sponsor Fast Company and "The Future is…Travel" panel coming later in October.
Don’t miss the Honeywell Opening Session on October 13th where we sit down with Honeywell leaders and our partners across businesses to discuss the trends, challenges and opportunities in each.
In addition, and specifically tailored for you, our Aerospace business will take center stage October 15th, featuring:
- Future innovations spanning the entire portfolio, including avionics, propulsion, the connected aircraft and emerging urban air mobility solutions. - Key technologies enabling cleaner, safer and more productive air travel, from airport to airplane. - A panel on optimizing the connectivity experience for Business Aviation. - A virtual tour of products available today straight from the Honeywell hangar.
{{my.Add to Calendar:default=Add to Calendar}}
REGISTER NOW <[[https://www.honeywell.com/en-us/tech-forum?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=hon-corp_techforum2020&utm_content=aero]]>
We look forward to you joining us!
© {{my.year}} Honeywell International Inc. This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>.
